column1: Little Goat Diner////Really a 3 1/2 but since we don't have half stars will give it 3. It was rare lunch date with the hubby we chose to meet here from our respective workplaces. Seated inside
column2: I felt the service was kinda slow our server did mention it was busier than useual. I had the veggie sandwich and my husband had the goat burger. Their special seasonal cider which was lukewarm to cold at its best was not a good drink to order. Nothing very exciting on or off the menu to make me come back.
